home.explanations_rules_paragraph:
Choose up to 5 types of land, each having its own reward chest.
Each land can be bought up to 5 times, steadily increasing price of land.

If a land is frozen, it's not yet available.
Every 24 hours, 10 ice lands will melt and be made available as Forest, Mountain, Desert, Plain or Water
